00052 enum Reply_mode
00053 {
00054   Reply_compound, 
00055   Reply_separate  
00056 };
00057 
00061 struct Ignore_errors
00062 { static void error(l4_msgtag_t, L4::Ipc::Iostream const &) {} };
00063 
00067 struct Default_timeout
00068 { static l4_timeout_t timeout() { return L4_IPC_SEND_TIMEOUT_0; } };
00069 
00073 struct Compound_reply
00074 {
00075   static Reply_mode before_reply(long, L4::Ipc::Ostream const &)
00076   { return Reply_compound; }
00077 };
00078 
00082 struct Default_setup_wait
00083 { static void setup_wait(L4::Ipc::Istream &, Reply_mode) {} };
00084 
00091 struct Default_loop_hooks :
00092   public Ignore_errors, public Default_timeout, public Compound_reply,
00093   public Default_setup_wait
00094 {};

00097 template< typename HOOKS >
00098 class Timed_work : public HOOKS
00099 {
00100 protected:
00101   l4_cpu_time_t _timeout;
00102 
00103 public:
00104   Timed_work()
00105   : _timeout(HOOKS::next_timeout(HOOKS::current_time())) {}
00106 
00107   l4_timeout_t timeout()
00108   {
00109     return l4_timeout(L4_IPC_TIMEOUT_0,
00110                       l4_timeout_abs(_timeout, this->timeout_br()));
00111   }
00112 
00113   void setup_wait(L4::Ipc::Istream &s, Reply_mode mode)
00114   {
00115     if (_timeout <= this->current_time()
00116         && mode == Reply_separate)
00117       {
00118   this->work();
00119         _timeout = this->next_timeout(_timeout);
00120       }
00121     HOOKS::setup_wait(s, mode);
00122   }
00123 
00124   Reply_mode before_reply(long, L4::Ipc::Ostream const &)
00125   {
00126     if (_timeout <= this->current_time())
00127       return Reply_separate;
00128     return Reply_compound;
00129   }
00130 };
00131 
00132 template< typename R >
00133 struct Direct_dispatch
00134 {
00135   R &r;
00136   Direct_dispatch(R &r) : r(r) {}
00137   long operator () (l4_umword_t obj, L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios)
00138   { return r.dispatch(obj, ios); }
00139 };
00140 
00141 template< typename R >
00142 struct Direct_dispatch<R*>
00143 {
00144   R *r;
00145   Direct_dispatch(R *r) : r(r) {}
00146   long operator () (l4_umword_t obj, L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios)
00147   { return r->dispatch(obj, ios); }
00148 };
00149 
00150 template< typename R, typename Exc = L4::Runtime_error>
00151 struct Exc_dispatch : private Direct_dispatch<R>
00152 {
00153   Exc_dispatch(R r) : Direct_dispatch<R>(r) {}
00154   long operator () (l4_umword_t obj, L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios)
00155   {
00156     try
00157       {
00158         return Direct_dispatch<R>::operator () (obj, ios);
00159       }
00160     catch (Exc &e)
00161       {
00162         return e.err_no();
00163       }
00164   }
00165 };
00166 
00167 }
00168 
00183 /*template <
00184   typename REGISTRY,
00185   typename LOOP_HOOKS = Ipc_svr::Default_loop_hooks,
00186   typename REGISTRY_WRAPPER
00187 >*/
00188 template< typename LOOP_HOOKS = Ipc_svr::Default_loop_hooks >
00189 class Server :
00190   public LOOP_HOOKS
00191 {
00192 public:
00198   explicit Server(l4_utcb_t *utcb) : _iostream(utcb) {}
00199 
00206   template< typename DISPATCH >
00207   inline void internal_loop(DISPATCH dispatch);
00208 
00209   template< typename R >
00210   inline void loop_noexc(R r)
00211   { internal_loop(Ipc_svr::Direct_dispatch<R>(r)); }
00212 
00213   template< typename R >
00214   inline void loop(R r)
00215   { internal_loop(Ipc_svr::Exc_dispatch<R>(r)); }
00216 
00217 protected:
00218   inline l4_msgtag_t reply_n_wait(long reply, l4_umword_t *p);
00219 
00220 public:
00221   Ipc::Iostream _iostream;
00222 };
00223 
00224 template< typename L >
00225 inline l4_msgtag_t
00226 Server<L>::reply_n_wait(long reply, l4_umword_t *p)
00227 {
00228   if (reply != -L4_ENOREPLY)
00229     {
00230       Ipc_svr::Reply_mode m = this->before_reply(reply, _iostream);
00231       if (m == Ipc_svr::Reply_compound)
00232   {
00233     this->setup_wait(_iostream, m);
00234     return _iostream.reply_and_wait(p, this->timeout(), reply);
00235   }
00236       else
00237   {
00238     l4_msgtag_t res = _iostream.reply(this->timeout(), reply);
00239     if (res.has_error())
00240       return res;
00241   }
00242     }
00243   this->setup_wait(_iostream, Ipc_svr::Reply_separate);
00244   return _iostream.wait(p, this->timeout());
00245 }
00246 
00247 template< typename L >
00248 template< typename DISPATCH >
00249 inline void
00250 Server<L>::internal_loop(DISPATCH dispatch)
00251 {
00252   l4_msgtag_t res;
00253   l4_umword_t p;
00254   long r = -L4_ENOREPLY;
00255 
00256   while (true)
00257     {
00258       res = reply_n_wait(r, &p);
00259       if (res.has_error())
00260   {
00261     this->error(res, _iostream);
00262     r = -L4_ENOREPLY;
00263     continue;
00264   }
00265 
00266       _iostream.Ipc::Ostream::reset();
00267       r = dispatch(p, _iostream);
00268     }
00269 }

00282 class Server_object
00283 {
00284 public:
00297   virtual int dispatch(unsigned long obj, Ipc::Iostream &ios) = 0;
00298   virtual ~Server_object() {}
00299 
00300 
00301   Cap<Kobject> obj_cap() const { return _cap; }
00302   template< typename T>
00303   void obj_cap(Cap<T> const &cap) { _cap = cap; }
00304   void obj_cap(Cap<Kobject> const &cap) { _cap = cap; }
00305 
00306 private:
00307   Cap<Kobject> _cap;
00308 };
00309 
00315 class Basic_registry
00316 {
00317 public:
00318   typedef Server_object Value;
00319   static Value *find(l4_umword_t id)
00320   { return reinterpret_cast<Value*>(id & ~3UL); }
00321 
00327   static int dispatch(l4_umword_t obj, L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios)
00328   {
00329     Value *o = find(obj);
00330 
00331     if (!o)
00332       return -L4_ENOENT;
00333 
00334     return o->dispatch(obj, ios);
00335   }
00336 };
00337 
00338 }
